name: Hero Turtle Kills a Wizard DX
name_original: Hero Turtle Kills a Wizard DX
description:
It's finally here! After months of off-and-on development, the Hero Turtle Kills a Wizard director's cut is finally complete! Whether you're a Hero Turtle veteran, or you're coming out of your shell for the first time, there's never been a better way to play 2022's best turtle game!

Hero Turtle Kills a Wizard DX is a 2D top-down action adventure game where you play as a turtle (shocking). Your home, Turtle Village, has lived in peace and harmony for thousands of years, until a dickhead wizard suddenly appeared and summoned an army of mischievous demons. The turtles have been terrorized by slightly-malicious pranks and japes ever since. You've trained your whole life to save your people, and today is finally the day. Armed with only your shell, your slow wit, and the unwavering spirit of a hero, you embark on an epic quest to kill the wizard.
